title: Ontario, Canada
description: Took a trip to Canada with my family; visited Toronto, Ottowa, Montreal, and Quebec.

title: New England, U.S.A.
description: Hit all 6 New England states in a couple weeks with my family.

title: Shanghai, China
description: Visited the Shanghai area of China with a tour group; toured various regions near the city.

title: France
description: Went to France with a group from high school after senior year; visited Paris, Reims, Nancy, Strasbourg, Colmar, Selestat, and Beaune, and stayed with a host family in Lyon.
